content.question: Which of the following scenarios best exemplifies Madisonâ€™s argument in The Federalist 46 ?

choices.label: An individual who is paying income taxes to both state and federal government
States enforcing certain laws along interstate highways, such as laws banning the use of mobile phones while driving
Congress increasing spending on national defense so that each state does not have to spend money on defense programs
States creating universal health care for their state even though the federal government does not endorse such a policy.

content.answer: States creating universal health care for their state even though the federal government does not endorse such a policy.
